title: Sulfonamide based pyrimidine derivatives combating Plasmodium parasite by inhibiting falcipains-2 and falcipains-3 as antimalarial agents
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,24725-24740
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04370G, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Abdur Rahman, Shazia Anjum, Jaimin D. Bhatt, Bharat C. Dixit, Anju Singh, Sabiha khan, Sadaf Fatima, Tarosh S. Patel, Nasimul Hoda
In this report, we present the design and synthesis of a novel series of pyrimidine-tethered spirochromane-based sulfonamide derivatives aimed at combating drug resistance in malaria.
